text: (arthaat) ek rasool[1] jo padhakar sunaate hain tumhen allaah kee khulee aayaten taaki vah nikaale unhen, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, andhakaaron se prakaash kee or aur jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar karega, vah use pravesh dega aise svargon mein, pravaahit hain jinamen naharen, ve sadaavaasee honge unamen. allaah ne usake lie uttam jeevika taiyaar kar rakhee hai
